Name: Caroline Ottaway-Searle
Job/Team Function: Responsible for operational human resources and recruitment and for developing the organisation through leadership development, talent management and coaching, and staff engagement.

Name: Jeff James
Job/Team Function: Responsible for providing leadership in information management and policy across government, the wider public sector and the archive sector to improve the way information is managed.

Job Title: Acting Director, Customer and Business Development
Job/Team Function: Responsible for customer, product and service strategy, partnership and business development, trading services and marketing and communications. This team also delivers the digitisation programme and strategy for The National Archives and partner websites.

Name: Oliver Morley
Job Title: Chief Executive and Keeper of the Records
Job/Team Function: Responsible for The National Archives' future direction as well as current performance.

Name: Carol Tullo
Job/Team Function: Responsible for providing and developing onsite, online and remote services to the public and schools, and for the estates and its assets. Also responsible for managing customer relations and maintaining service excellence.

Name: Clem Brohier
Job/Team Function: Primarily responsible for managing The National Archive's finances and liaising with HM Treasury.� In addition, his directorate includes corporate planning, risk management, procurement and strategic project management support.
